topic.title: What are these ?
topic.body:
http://imgur.com/ZqEaGxK

Check the link , it's a screenshot.
And also , why am I getting these ? I allowed almost every site on ZeroNet to use from 500Mb to 1 Gb , form my 1 TB HDD , or maybe that's the problem ?

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Just a Test message passing by

1_1KWfi9GbSvnLzLM3QbLSBhvRRiB2aq5rjH.body: You could try right click on the zero net icon in your taskbar and click on " Request feature/report bug " and then post there what you posted here , and if the developers will take it into consideration maybe it will be added as a new feature of the website. Good luck buddy.

1_1JpxTAYzGdJppaeg7xS7VmBaXZF9d94WRj.body: it's a link to imgur.com , a massive website hosting pictures ................................... lol ...................................

yeah , I totally uploaded porn there ... why do you even bother to comment if u got nothing to say which is related to the post ... you're too skeptical.
> [ancap](#comment_110_1FYXQGLBeNabf5jZHgP4CwzbmJSKaK4oMz): I know the site, I don't know the content. For all I know you may have posted illegal porn there, so I'll pass.
i'll figure it out myself , thank you for nothing goodbye.

8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: yes , Play is working , torrent links fixed

17_1EZTWytasXcKdiUFnN4KHqAfvg1nwkTkKv.body: how can i help ? i got 300 gb to spare , i can share 150 if needed :D

1_1PvAednzaMJiuMz1SD5wF3m3Hx7SK75zHv.body: i wanna use the Zero Tube thing , but whenever i upload something it doesn't start in torrent , it's stuck at " Connecting Peers "

> [skylakexts](#comment_13_1JpxTAYzGdJppaeg7xS7VmBaXZF9d94WRj): i wanna use the Zero Tube thing , but whenever i upload something it doesn't start in torrent , it's stuck at " Connecting Peers "

Nevermind i fixed it and everything is working
Whenever i upload something on ZeroTube it has NO PREVIEW image , what can i do to change that ?

> [testuser789](#comment_1_1PvAednzaMJiuMz1SD5wF3m3Hx7SK75zHv): skylakexts, I see what you mean, but it's not working: Here's a screenshot of how your videos look like when I search for "video" on ZeroTube - 0 peers, no possibility to watch them: http://abload.de/img/zerotube-skylakextc-uxrk0f.png

You can't watch unless i am ON ZeroTube and webtorretn is open at the same time , and at night i shut down pc so nobody can watch them :( we must figure out a way for them to be available even when the one who uploaded them isn't online ... :/ i think

> [testuser789](#comment_2_1PvAednzaMJiuMz1SD5wF3m3Hx7SK75zHv): Well, if you mean it... you've posted this 58 minutes ago, so it's fair to assume that you're online now with ZeroNet and WebTorrent. So, let me repeat looking at ZeroTube now... sadly still not working... it looks like before...
> Aside of that I think in this particular case you're right with your assumption, that you need to be online for others to watch it. But only because you're the only one offering it right now. When more people are viewing it, the complete video will be in the network independently from you. That's the magic of ZeroNet of being not just decentralized - like MediaGoblin - but even distributed.

i got 4 to 9 peers on all videos , i used zeronet on mom's laptop , i can watch all the videos i posted for the test , still no previews , but the video is running smoothly , the zeronet app works too on my phone on zerotube

http://imgur.com/a/tuq35
4 peers on website cuz the 4th is me , went to 8 then 12 then back to 3 or 4 , if i close zero net all peers in webtorrent drop to 0 and you can't watch anything because none is seeding it or some other reason i don't know about :/

> [styromaniac](#comment_12_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): Since WebTorrent doesn't have DHT it wouldn't matter if I was seeding, would it? So the torrents probably need to be running on skylakexts' end regardless of my seeding?
> No online trackers means no ZeroTube videos.

Soooo we need a server to ermanently run the webtorrent in order to keep everything on zerotube running .... that might be an issue ...

http://imgur.com/l36e6VE

businiess is growing people , more please , i need a car ...
